text: Richard Dawson (born Colin Lionel Emm; 20 November 1932 â€“ 2 June 2012) was an English-American actor and television presenter.TV star Richard Dawson dies Dawson was born Colin Lionel Emm in Gosport, Hampshire to an American father and English mother. Dawson married Diana Dors in 1959; they lived in California. The couple had two sons, entertainment manager Mark (born 1960) and Gary (born 1962). She left him and in 1967 the couple divorced. His second marriage lasted from 1991 until his death from esophageal cancer in Los Angeles, California.
